document.full_text: a scientist in denmark has been indicted by a federal grand jury in atlanta for allegedly stealing $1 million in grant money that the centers for disease control and prevention had earmarked for autism research.
document.title: denmark scientist accused of stealing autism research money
lines_and_colors: a scientist in denmark has been indicted by a federal grand jury in atlanta for allegedly stealing $1 million in grant money that the centers for disease control and prevention had earmarked for autism research.
